name: Flask-Dance with Twitter & SQLAlchemy
description: Testing Flask-Dance's OAuth integration with Twitter using SQLAlchemy

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

TWITTER_OAUTH_API_KEY.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by Twitter

TWITTER_OAUTH_API_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your application, assigned by Twitter
